name: Paint David
description:
Demo for a texture painting tool I wrote for Unity. You can paint on the master piece of Michelangelo, the statue of David.
If you want to mess around with the code your self, it is available on Github: https://github.com/IRCSS/TexturePaint

Also I wrote a small blog about the implementation of the details: https://medium.com/@shahriyarshahrabi/mesh-texture-painting-in-unity-using-shade...
